short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily convert any webpage element to PDF. Select elements with precision and generate clean PDFs without unwanted content.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ePDF (Element PDF Extractor) is a powerful Chrome extension that revolutionizes how you save web content to PDF. Unlike traditional methods that force you to save entire pages, ePDF allows you to select and convert specific elements with surgical precision.

How to Use:

Click the ePDF icon in your toolbar
Click "Select Element to PDF"
Hover over the desired content
Click to select the element
Use Chrome's print dialog to save as PDF
